message: I propose dividing the $10,000 with an 80/20 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a significant portion for investment or personal use.
I propose a 60/40 split, a fair and reasonable division considering the current situation.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 72/28 split. This maintains a balance while ensuring a substantial amount for both parties.
I propose a 45/55 split, a slight adjustment to account for the inflation and still prioritize a fair division.
